name: Hellfire Ring
flavorText: Crafted of trophies ripped from vanquished foes, none can deny the bravery of a hero who wears a Hellfire Ring.
flavorTextHtml: Crafted of trophies ripped from vanquished foes, none can deny the bravery of a hero who wears a Hellfire Ring.
